title: Welcome to MapleSteps — create your Action Plan baseline
Run QuickCheck (FSW-67) and note eligibility status
Open Score and review full FSW-67 breakdown
depends_on: 02_fsw67_quickcheck

title: Add CRS basic profile (age, education, work years, language placeholders)
Search NOC 2021 and shortlist 2–3 likely NOC codes
Confirm TEER level for your shortlisted NOC
depends_on: Search NOC 2021 and shortlist 2–3 likely NOC codes

title: Review latest Express Entry rounds (cut-offs & categories)
Review current IRCC fees and budget snapshot
Read: ECA overview (why, who needs it, which bodies)
Pick your ECA body (WES/ICES/IQAS/ICAS/CES/others) based on degree & region
depends_on: Read: ECA overview (why, who needs it, which bodies)

title: Make ECA account with chosen body
depends_on: Pick your ECA body (WES/ICES/IQAS/ICAS/CES/others) based on degree & region

title: Order university transcripts per ECA body instructions
depends_on: Make ECA account with chosen body

title: Arrange degree certificate photocopies / notarization if needed
depends_on: Make ECA account with chosen body

title: Ship documents to ECA body and record tracking number
depends_on: Order university transcripts per ECA body instructions
Arrange degree certificate photocopies / notarization if needed

title: Set reminder: follow up with ECA body if no update
depends_on: Ship documents to ECA body and record tracking number

title: Language plan — pick test (IELTS/CELPIP/TEF/TCF)
Book language test date
depends_on: Language plan — pick test (IELTS/CELPIP/TEF/TCF)

title: Baseline mock test to find CLB gaps
depends_on: Language plan — pick test (IELTS/CELPIP/TEF/TCF)

title: Create weekly study schedule (listening/reading/writing/speaking)
depends_on: Baseline mock test to find CLB gaps

title: Download prep resources and wordlists
depends_on: Create weekly study schedule (listening/reading/writing/speaking)

title: Work history — list all jobs with start/end dates
Pick primary NOC for work experience counting
depends_on: Work history — list all jobs with start/end dates
Search NOC 2021 and shortlist 2–3 likely NOC codes

title: Duty match: compare job duties to selected NOC (≥75% alignment)
depends_on: Pick primary NOC for work experience counting

title: Reference letter template download & customization
depends_on: Duty match: compare job duties to selected NOC (≥75% alignment)

title: Request reference letters from employers
depends_on: Reference letter template download & customization

title: Collect employment proofs (contracts, payslips, tax, bank showing salary)
depends_on: Request reference letters from employers

title: Prepare alternative proof plan if reference letter issues
depends_on: Collect employment proofs (contracts, payslips, tax, bank showing salary)

title: Proof of Funds — calculate family size requirement
Open/allocate funds to eligible accounts (savings/term deposit)
depends_on: Proof of Funds — calculate family size requirement

title: Start 6-month PoF seasoning tracker
depends_on: Open/allocate funds to eligible accounts (savings/term deposit)

title: Create IRCC GCKey/Sign-In Partner account
Create Express Entry profile shell (do not submit yet)
depends_on: Create IRCC GCKey/Sign-In Partner account

title: Enter language scores once received
depends_on: Book language test date

title: Enter ECA number and results once issued
depends_on: Ship documents to ECA body and record tracking number

title: Validate profile details against passport/IDs
depends_on: Create Express Entry profile shell (do not submit yet)

title: Recompute CRS with actual language & ECA
depends_on: Enter language scores once received
Enter ECA number and results once issued

title: Use CRS Optimizer (what-ifs: spouse, French, education, job offer)
depends_on: Recompute CRS with actual language & ECA

title: PNP mapping — shortlist suitable streams by profile
depends_on: Use CRS Optimizer (what-ifs: spouse, French, education, job offer)

title: PNP required docs checklist
depends_on: PNP mapping — shortlist suitable streams by profile

title: Consider French improvement plan if CLB < 7 (bonus points)
depends_on: Recompute CRS with actual language & ECA

title: Police certificates — list required countries
Request police certificates (lead times vary)
depends_on: Police certificates — list required countries

title: Passport validity check (≥6 months) and renew if needed
Digital photos meeting IRCC specs
Proof of relationship (spouse/partner/children) docs
Finalize EE profile and submit when ready
depends_on: Enter language scores once received
Enter ECA number and results once issued
Validate profile details against passport/IDs

title: Monitor draws; update profile promptly if any change
depends_on: Finalize EE profile and submit when ready

title: If ITA received — accept invitation in portal
Upfront medicals — book panel physician
depends_on: If ITA received — accept invitation in portal

title: Gather e-APR documents section-by-section
depends_on: If ITA received — accept invitation in portal

title: Employment letters & proofs — final check against NOC duties
depends_on: Gather e-APR documents section-by-section

title: PoF bank letters (official format, average balance)
depends_on: Gather e-APR documents section-by-section

title: Police certificates — upload to e-APR
depends_on: Request police certificates (lead times vary)
Gather e-APR documents section-by-section

title: Medical exam — upload info sheet
depends_on: Upfront medicals — book panel physician

title: Review e-APR for completeness and consistency
depends_on: Employment letters & proofs — final check against NOC duties
PoF bank letters (official format, average balance)
Police certificates — upload to e-APR
Medical exam — upload info sheet

title: Submit e-APR and pay fees
depends_on: Review e-APR for completeness and consistency

title: Post-submission tracker — record AOR date
depends_on: Submit e-APR and pay fees

title: Biometrics appointment (if required)
depends_on: Post-submission tracker — record AOR date

title: Respond to ADRs (additional document requests) promptly
depends_on: Post-submission tracker — record AOR date

title: PPR/COPR — review instructions and next steps
Landing prep — choose province/city and research housing
Landing checklist — documents to carry
Book flights and prepare travel folder
depends_on: PPR/COPR — review instructions and next steps

title: Arrival tasks — SIN, bank account, phone plan
Healthcare registration (province-specific)
depends_on: Arrival tasks — SIN, bank account, phone plan

title: Update Action Plan status weekly
Back up important documents to Vault
Set notifications for upcoming due dates
Re-check IRCC fees before any submission
Re-check latest draw trends before EE submission
